'''Gormr Doursmith''' is a character created for [[The Lord of the Rings Online]]. He was the [[Dourhands|Dourhand]] steward when the [[Longbeards]] were absent in the [[Ered Luin]]. He killed the guards of the Silver Deep Mines and poisoned their leader, [[Olin]].<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], Introduction, ''Intro: Gormr's Deeds''</ref> When [[Dáin Ironfoot|Dáin]], [[King under the Mountain]], wanted a tribute of them he refused to give him anything.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], Introduction, ''Intro: Return from the Lonely Mountain''</ref> Eventually he would make an alliance between him and the [[Goblins]] of the Mirkstone Tunnels<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], Introduction, ''Intro: Goblin Prowlers''</ref> and revived [[Skorgrím Dourhand]] with the aid of Ivar Bloodhand. But he was slain by [[Dwalin]] and the player shortly after the revival of Skorgrím.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], Introduction, ''Instance: Skorgrim's Tomb''</ref>
